text: Lüterswil-Gächliwil was a municipality in the district Bucheggberg, in the canton of Solothurn, Switzerland. It was created in 1994 from the merger of the two former municipalities of Lüterswil and Gächliwil.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 18 February 2011 Since 2024, it became a part of Buchegg. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the municipality of Lüterswil-Gächliwil * * * Category:Former municipalities of Solothurn
title: Lüterswil-Gächliwil
